The Train-the-Trainer education offers an in-depth introduction to the usage of the VIENNA Add-In and the principles of Core Components. The provided screencasts should enable trainers to successfully teach their trainees the concepts of UML modeling and the usage of the VIENNA Add-In.
  # [http://vienna-add-in.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/videos/VIENNAaddInInstaller.swf Installer]
  # Create a default [http://umm-dev.org/wp-content/videos/getting_started_video_create_default_upcc_sample_model.htm UPCC sample model]
  # Create BDTs using the [http://umm-dev.org/wp-content/videos/getting_started_video_create_bdt_using_the_bdt_editor.htm BDT Editor]
  # Create ABIEs using the [http://umm-dev.org/wp-content/videos/passport_part_2.htm ABIE Editor]
  # Using the [http://umm-dev.org/wp-content/videos/tool-demo-2.htm toolbox] to create UPCC artifacts
  # Using the [http://umm-dev.org/wp-content/videos/passport_part_2.htm DOC Library] to assemble BIEs to a actual model
  # Subsetting Wizard (tbd)
  # Importing UMM & UPCC into EA (tbd)
  # Importing a MapForce mapping file (tbd)
